title: LABMedical API
description: REST API for medical inventory management
Create, read, update and delete patients, doctors, appointments and exams
Endpoint for system's stats

title: LABMedical
description: Medical inventory management software
Login with email and password
Home page with system stats and list of patients
User can create, edit and delete a patient, appointment or exam record
Every patient has a page with personal information, appointments and exams
Responsive layout

title: Todo App
description: Can add, mark as completed and delete tasks
Filter by all/active/complete tasks
Can clear all completed tasks
Tasks are persisted using localStorage
Light and dark mode
Responsive layout

title: DEVinKnowledge
description: Knowledge base system with programming tips
User can create, edit and delete tips
Tips are persisted using localStorage
Indicators that show the user the system statistics
User can search by tip title
